title: Restore Admin Entry Point in Public Navigation (Desktop + Mobile + Footer)

requirements.summary: Add an Admin entry point link to the existing /admin/login route in desktop nav, mobile nav, and footer quick links without changing existing admin route protection.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation includes an "Admin" (or "Admin Login") link that navigates to "/admin/login" on desktop.
Mobile navigation includes the same "Admin" (or "Admin Login") link that navigates to "/admin/login".
Footer Quick Links includes an "Admin" (or "Admin Login") link that navigates to "/admin/login".
The existing admin routes remain unchanged: "/admin" continues to be protected and "/admin/login" remains the login entry point.

file_operations.description: Add an "Admin" / "Admin Login" navigation item that routes to "/admin/login" in the desktop nav section, and add the same link to the mobile menu list (ensuring it closes the mobile menu on click). Keep existing admin protection logic unchanged; only restore the public entry point.
Add an "Admin" / "Admin Login" item under the Footer "Quick Links" list that navigates to the hash-routed admin login path ("/#/admin/login") consistent with existing footer links.
